title: Ah! guilty sinner, ruined by transgression

verses.text:
Ah! guilty sinner, ruined by transgression, What will thy doom be when arrayed in terror
God shall command thee, covered with pollution, "Up to the judgment, up to the judgment!"

But if you trifle with his gracious message, Cleave to the world, and live for guilty pleasures,
Mercy, grown weary, will in righteous judgment Leave you forever.
